content.text:
[b]Dialogue tree actor system demo[/b]
Created by blurymind

Free avatar assets provided by sutemo
https://sutemo.itch.io/male-character-sprite-for-visual-novel 

and
https://konett.itch.io/modern-visual-novel-backgrounds

[b]Click anywhere to continue[/b]

events.comment: setup avatars based on active actor in text
s left: I am now standing on the left side!
Set tags to control setting up dialogue in a node without commands
if an actor line has the key word left or right, we also want to assign the left or right avatar to him/her

s left: I am standing on the left side // will detect if left parameter is passed and if so set the avatar on that side. We need to also unset it from the other avatar on the other side, but lets leave that out of this demo
s shocked: blah blah // will detect that the second parameter has the actor's face and accordingly update their face info
update avatars based on variables that were set on them
